languages.text: Targets within the area of effect must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round. On a successful test, the targets suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect.
languages.original_text: Цели в области действия совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала они оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g} на 1 раунд, а в случае успеха – {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлены{/g} на 1 раунд.

traits.locale_text: Targets within the area of effect must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round. On a successful test, the targets suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect.

Targets within the area of effect must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round. On a successful test, the targets suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect.

Targets become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If the target successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} this grenade, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect instead.

languages.text: Цели в области действия совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала они оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g} на 1 раунд, а в случае успеха – {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлены{/g} на 1 раунд.
languages.original_text:
Targets become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If the target successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} this grenade, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect instead.

traits.locale_text:
Обездвиживает цели на 1 раунд.
Если цели удается уклониться, она получает эффект замедления.

Обездвиживает цели на 1 раунд.
Если цели удается уклониться, она получает эффект замедления.

languages.text: 所有处于目标区域内的目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一轮。如果目标检定成功，则仅会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: Targets within the area of effect must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round. On a successful test, the targets suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: 所有处于目标区域内的目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一轮。如果目标检定成功，则仅会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态。

languages.text: 効果範囲内のターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、1ラウンド{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。判定に成功した場合、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}効果を受ける。
languages.original_text: Targets within the area of effect must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round. On a successful test, the targets suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: 効果範囲内のターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、1ラウンド{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。判定に成功した場合、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}効果を受ける。

languages.text: Los objetivos en el área de efecto deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} durante 1 asalto. Si la prueba tiene éxito, los objetivos sufren el efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}.
languages.original_text: Targets within the area of effect must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round. On a successful test, the targets suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: Los objetivos en el área de efecto deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} durante 1 asalto. Si la prueba tiene éxito, los objetivos sufren el efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}.

languages.text: Ziele im Wirkungsbereich brauchen eine erfolgreiche {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, um nicht 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} zu werden. Ist die Probe erfolgreich, werden die Ziele {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsam{/g}.
languages.original_text: Targets within the area of effect must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round. On a successful test, the targets suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: Ziele im Wirkungsbereich brauchen eine erfolgreiche {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, um nicht 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} zu werden. Ist die Probe erfolgreich, werden die Ziele {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsam{/g}.

languages.text: Les cibles présentes dans la zone d'effet doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. En cas d'échec, elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} pendant 1 round. En cas de réussite, elles sont seulement {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralenties{/g}.
languages.original_text: Targets within the area of effect must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round. On a successful test, the targets suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: Les cibles présentes dans la zone d'effet doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. En cas d'échec, elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} pendant 1 round. En cas de réussite, elles sont seulement {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralenties{/g}.
